definition: wrapping cloth/a bundle wrapped in cloth/load/weight/burden/funny part/punchline
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
surname Bao
bundle wrapped in cloth
to lay down a heavy burden
to have a weight on one's mind/to take on a mental burden
burden of having to maintain one's image as a pop idol
family heirloom/most precious family possession/person's secrets/one's best performance
wrapping cloth
sth weighing on one's mind
lit. to fling off a bundle/fig. to abandon one's responsibility for sth/to wash one's hands of the matter

sentences.english: She unwrapped the parcel, and took out the mirror it con-tained.
sentences.chinese: 她打开包袱，从里面拿出镜子。

sentences.english: And this from a man who, quite recently, could not trap a bag of suet.
sentences.chinese: 这都源于这个刚刚丢弃了板油包袱的男人。

sentences.english: Abandon unnecessary guilt. It's extra baggage you don't need to carry.
sentences.chinese: 丢弃无由得愧咎，别让它成为你的沉重包袱。

sentences.english: In the comic dialogue, two performers revealed the joke suddenly, which made the audience convulse with laughter.
sentences.chinese: 相声演员不时抖包袱，令现场观众捧腹大笑。

sentences.english: Mr Reagan brings with him some heavy ideological baggage.
sentences.chinese: 里根先生则带有一些沉重的思想包袱。

sentences.english: Now, I do not have the ideological baggage, it is easier.
sentences.chinese: 现在，我没有了思想包袱，很轻松了。

sentences.english: Physical possessions are, indeed, a burden.
sentences.chinese: 物质形态的所有物的确是个包袱。

sentences.english: Mr Ozawa was his party’s biggest electoral liability by far.
sentences.chinese: 小泽先生是其所在党目前最大的竞选包袱。

sentences.english: He unwrapped his pack and the first thing he did was to count his matches.
sentences.chinese: 他打开包袱，第一件事就是数数他的火柴。

sentences.english: Place the bundle on the luggage rack.
Because abandon otiose burden, the life would be more fine.
sentences.chinese: 因为抛弃了不必要的包袱，生活才会更美好。

sentences.english: Burdened with no fardel of the past, he has boldly taken the initiative.
sentences.chinese: 但是他无历史包袱，以大刀阔斧决断争取主动。

sentences.english: All you can do is throw stuff out there and experiment.
sentences.chinese: 你所能做的就是扔掉包袱，做各种尝试。

sentences.english: Then let articulate the heart become ever albatross.
sentences.chinese: 那就让冷暖自知的心成为自己永远的包袱。

sentences.english: Agencies say, Heartbroken, the burden back to the shop up to go home.
sentences.chinese: 秀才一听，心灰意冷，回店收拾包袱准备回家。
